parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: The hostname or the IP address of the PCK gateway

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The IP port of the PCK gateway

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: The login username of the PCK gateway

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The login password of the PCK gateway

parameter.name: mode
parameter.label: Dimming Mode
parameter.description: ATTENTION: Dimming range of all modules. Must be the same value as configured in LCN-PRO (Options/Settings/Expert Settings). If you only have modules with firmware newer than Feb. 2013, you probably want to choose 0 - 200.

parameter.name: timeoutMs
parameter.label: Connection Timeout
parameter.description: Period after which an LCN command is resent, when no acknowledge has been received (in ms).

parameter.name: moduleId
parameter.label: Module ID
parameter.description: The module ID, configured in LCN-PRO

parameter.name: segmentId
parameter.label: Segment ID
parameter.description: The segment ID the module is in (0 if no segments are present)

parameter.name: groupId
parameter.label: Group Number
parameter.description: The group number, configured in LCN-PRO

parameter.name: moduleId
parameter.label: Module ID
parameter.description: The module ID of any module in the group. The state of this module is used for visualization of the group as representative for all modules.

parameter.name: segmentId
parameter.label: Segment ID
parameter.description: The segment ID of all modules in this group (0 if no segments are present)

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.label: Pulses per kWh
parameter.description: Only for S0 counters (power or energy)

parameter.name: ramp
parameter.label: Ramp
parameter.description: Time in seconds until the output's value is reached.
